metadata.synopsis: Will play if the player is caught stealing from the vault. Uses Allandra as the speaker for now butwe imagine this to be the voice of Umberlee
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Steal from the water queen's house

0.speaker: Umberlee
0.text: You dare steal from the very sea that birthed you? Enjoy these breaths - they shall be your last.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Voice of the goddess UmberleeNodeContext: All-powerful goddess who has been wronged but knows the player will get their comeuppance
